title: Evaluations playground
subtitle: Define evaluations against your tldw server and inspect recent runs.
loadErrorDescription: Check your tldw server connection and API credentials, then try again.
emptyList: No evaluations yet. Once you create one, it will appear here.
rateLimitsErrorDescription: We could not retrieve evaluation quotas from the server.
rateLimitsNoData: Rate limit information is not available for this server.
noEvalSelectedRuns: Select an evaluation to see its recent runs.
runsEmpty: No runs yet for this evaluation.
noRunSelected: Select a run to see details.
datasetsEmpty: No datasets yet. Create one to attach to evaluations.
datasetCreateSuccessDescription: Your dataset is ready to use in evaluations.
datasetCreateErrorDescription: The server rejected this dataset. Check the fields and try again.
evalNameValidation: Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
evalSpecParseError: Evaluation spec must be valid JSON.
inlineDatasetCheckbox: Attach inline dataset instead of referencing dataset_id
createErrorDescription: The server rejected this evaluation. Ensure name, type, and spec are valid.
deleteConfirmDescription: This will remove the evaluation definition. Runs already created remain in history.
noEvalSelectedDetails: Select an evaluation to inspect its spec.
runCreateSuccessDescription: Your evaluation run has started. You can monitor it from the server UI.
runCreateErrorDescription: The server rejected this run request. Check the model and try again.
historyEmpty: Run a query to see recent activity.
emptyConnectDescription: To create and run evaluations, first connect to your tldw server.
emptyConnectExample1: Open Settings â†’ tldw server to add your server URL and API key.
emptyConnectExample2: Once connected, you can define evaluations and inspect metrics here.
datasetSamplesEmpty: No samples returned for this page.
betaDescription: Evaluations is currently in beta. Some features may be incomplete or change.
idempotencyKeyTooltip: Prevents duplicate creation if the browser retries the request. Use a unique key per creation attempt.
evalTypesHint: Supported: model_graded, response_quality, rag, rag_pipeline, geval, exact_match, includes, fuzzy_match, proposition_extraction, qa3, label_choice, nli_factcheck, ocr.
runPollingHint: Runs execute asynchronously. The UI polls every ~3s until status leaves running/pending.
deleteDatasetConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the dataset. Evaluations using it will need a new dataset.
deleteWebhookConfirmDescription: This will stop sending events to this URL. You can re-register it later.
webhookInfoItem1: Webhooks receive POST requests when evaluation events occur.
webhookInfoItem2: Use the secret to verify webhook signatures and prevent spoofing.
webhookInfoItem3: Events include: started, completed, failed, cancelled, and progress updates.
specBuilderJsonOnly: This evaluation type uses JSON configuration. Use the editor below.
specBuilderParseWarning: Spec JSON is invalid. Fix the JSON to use the visual builder.
datasetUploadPrompt: Drop JSONL/JSON file here or click to upload
datasetUploadHint: Accepted: .jsonl or .json containing an array of samples.
compareEmpty: Select two runs with metrics to compare.
sampleInputRequired: Provide a sample input or upload samples JSON.
